titles: The constant couple, or, A trip to the Jubilee a comedy, acted at the Theatre-Royal in Drury-Lane, by His Majesty's servants / by Mr. George Farquhar.
author: Farquhar, George, 1677?-1707.
publisher: Printed for Ralph Smith ... and Bennet Banbury ...,
notes: First ed.: "The second edition with a new scene added to the part of Wildair" has same date. For variations in text of the two editions see George Farquhar, edited by W. Archer, London, 1906, p. 1 and 135.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
